org.csstudio.platform.internal.simpledal
Class ProcessVariableConnectionService

java.lang.Object
  org.csstudio.platform.internal.simpledal.ProcessVariableConnectionService
All Implemented Interfaces:
IProcessVariableConnectionService
public class ProcessVariableConnectionService
extends java.lang.Object
implements IProcessVariableConnectionService

Standard implementation of IProcessVariableConnectionService. This service is stateful as it needs to track open connections to the control system.

Author:
Sven Wende TODO: Schreiben von Werten ermöglichen! TODO: Sync/Async Lesen von Werten (x) TODO: Ping-Funktion TODO: SDS auf diesen Service umstellen

                                    ValueType valueType,

doGetCurrentValue

private <E> E doGetCurrentValue(IProcessVariableAddress pv,
                                ValueType valueType)
                     throws ConnectionException
Determines the current value for a process variable. This process runs synchronous and blocks any other threads. The channel connection will be closed immediately.

Type Parameters:
E - the expected return type
Parameters:
pv - the process variable
valueType - the value type
Returns:
the current value or null if none could be obtained
Throws:
ConnectionException

private org.epics.css.dal.DynamicValueProperty createOrGetDalProperty(IProcessVariableAddress pv,
                                                                      java.lang.Class propertyType)
                                                               throws java.lang.Exception
Delivers a real DAL property. The delivered property may already be connected BUT must not.

Parameters:
pv - the process variable address
propertyType - the expected property type
Returns:
a DAL property
Throws:
java.lang.InstantiationException
org.epics.css.dal.RemoteException
java.lang.Exception
